body:
Reported by jazevec:

Rebuke didn't work at all. I paid for the cost, the card was gone, the creature remained there. Maaybe it was an earlier regeneration or indestructible effect, but I don't remember anything like that. (In best case it's an interface issue - Shandalar-like visible Graveyard would make it much easier to see what spell has just been cast). It was cast on golem - maybe from the green splicer.
author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)
title: Rebuke doesn't work at all
content:
_From [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/) on June 15, 2012 15:04:47_

Reported by jazevec:

Rebuke didn't work at all. I paid for the cost, the card was gone, the creature remained there. Maaybe it was an earlier regeneration or indestructible effect, but I don't remember anything like that. (In best case it's an interface issue - Shandalar-like visible Graveyard would make it much easier to see what spell has just been cast). It was cast on golem - maybe from the green splicer.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=226_
